buginformation.summary: Auto Lists/Bullets
buginformation.description: Apparently the iOS app has a cool feature that automatically inserts bullet points when it detects that you're writing a list. Why don't Androids get to have nice things? Here's the breakdown: If a user starts typing a list using one of the markdown list prefixes (-, +, *), let's help them out by automatically inserting a new bullet when they add a line break. Users can add multiple levels for the list and we'll automatically add the necessary spaces. Adding a line break on an empty list item will either decrement the list level or remove the empty item.
